title: One Can’t Judge by Appearance - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Bickering Couple   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Familial Love   Famous Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Low-key Protagonist   Modern Day   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Stalkers   Tragic Past   Tsundere   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Butterfly's Shadow Beneath the Moon   Yue Xia Die Ying   月下蝶影
description:
Yan Xi grew up with the unique face of the heroine of a bitter drama. 

Even the old man who set up a fortune-telling stall at the back door of the community had to shake his head and sigh with emotion when he saw her. 

This girl looked bitter and ill-fated. It’s a pity. Pity.

Yan Xi：……

As the saying goes, You can not judge a person by appearance, just as you can’t measure the sea with a pint pot.

Yan Xi felt that although she had the face of a bitter heroine, she had the heart of a comedy heroine.>
